code: import React from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){var reak="{ REACT }";var test=function test(){var mensaje=prompt("algo");if(mensaje===null){mensaje=reak.replaceAll("{","").replaceAll("}","");document.querySelector(".eljeader").innerHTML="PRACTICE - {".concat(mensaje,"}");}else if(mensaje===""){mensaje=reak.replaceAll("{","").replaceAll("}","");document.querySelector(".eljeader").innerHTML="PRACTICE - {".concat(mensaje,"}");}else{document.querySelector(".eljeader").innerHTML="PRACTICE - {".concat(mensaje,"}");};};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"eljeader",onClick:test,children:["PRACTICE - ",reak]})});}export default Header;
